name: Fantasy Warlord
description:
The best fantasy RPG for mobile!

Collect powerful Guardians and form allies to attack the World Boss!

★ COLLECT★

• Extract and collect the souls of legendary Guardians!

• Discover the 4 types of Guardians - Human, Demon, God and Gaia!

★COMBINE★

• Combine your Guardians to create an even more powerful Guardian!

• The combinations are endless!

★BATTLE★

• Gather your Guardians and battle World Bosses to climb the ranks!

• Battle against other players around the world!

★SOCIALIZE★

• Form alliances with other players via global chat!

• Take revenge on defeated allies and receive lucrative rewards!

Join the community at https://www.facebook.com/PlayFantasyWarlord

Terms of Service: http://bit.ly/termsgamevil

Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/privacygamevil
